nodes.text: Stuffed puffer pig was a dish that contained roasted slices of puffer pig stuffed with herbs. At some point following the Battle of Takodana in 34 ABY, the Artiodac chef Strono Tuggs included a recipe for stuffed puffer pig in his cookbook, The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook. His mobile restaurant, Tuggs' Grub, only served the dish when he could purchase puffer pigs where he had docked his food freighter, as he could not dedicate his limited storage space to nervous creatures that ballooned when frightened.

Stuffed puffer pig was first pictured and mentioned in the 2019 recipe book Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook, which written by Chelsea Monroe-Cassel and Marc Sumerak. The out-of-universe recipe is made with pork tenderloins wrapped with bacon and rolled around a filling of baby spinach, apple, fennel, sage, pepper, and salt.
